name: Aplyss
tagline: You have the idea, We the technology ...
description: Aplyss is a pioneering company in the sector, offering their experience in areas of development, consulting, strategy and service of technological products. Their goal is to collaborate with their clients to take full advantage of their resources and activities. The team seek to optimize and provide the maximum technological knowledge in the specific area, thus giving added value in all your daily activities, providing everything you need and being a leader in your sector.
